content:
Before your agents can use the case feed and its publisher in Lightning Experience, you must recreate some quick actions. You also can customize the agent experience for case hovers, let agents merge cases, and select a date-and-time stamp format on case feed posts and comments.

To set up cases for Lightning Experience:

Manage Cases

AND

Customize Application

Quick actions appear on mobile devices, whereas standard case feed publishers do not. To use the feed-first design on cases, recreate these publishers as quick actions.

Create a Log a Call Quick Action for Cases
Create a Send Email Quick Action for Cases
Create a Change Status Quick Action for Cases
Create a Change Owner Quick Action for Cases
Create a Close Case Quick Action
Create a Case Comment Quick Action

Add Quick Actions to the Case Page Layout for Lightning Experience
Customize Case Hovers in Lightning Experience
Set Up Case Merge in Lightning Experience
Set Up a Customer Feedback Survey
title: Setting Up Cases in Service Cloud
